description:
Danny and Billy are show offs!
We had gotten up early and eaten breakfast. Then we decided to take the boys out on the lake for some fun.
We got one of those big inflatable tubes and tied it to the back of the boat. OK, maybe we went a little too fast. Danny had a blast. I wasn't so sure about Billy!
The thing was that the guys (especially Danny) kept taking their swim suits off. I thought it was hilarious because there were a lot of other boats on the water that got an eyeful of hot, young cock and ass. We were lucky we didn't get arrested!
We found a little secluded spot and moored. There were some rocks that were all warm and sunny and Billy got to suck on Danny's cock, something I am sure he wanted all morning.
But, there were too many people around and I wanted to see these two fuck. So, we went back to my friend's condo where the kissing, sucking, and fucking ran well into the afternoon...
title: Danny & Billy
